doc.field: - The weighted average yield for 50 mln N.Z. Dlrs of 77-day Treasury bills sold in this week's regular weekly tender was 24.97 pct, the Reserve Bank said. The weighted average yield on 30 mln dlrs of 56-day bill was 25.50 pct, it said in a statement. No comparable bills have been offered recently. Bids totalling 379 mln dlrs were received for the 80 mln dlrs of bills on offer.
